title: AutoMapa 6.8.0 Final (2011) [Multilanguaje]
description:
AutoMapa 6.8.0 Final (2011) [Multilanguaje]

English:
------------
Category: Programs 
Language: English, Spanish, Multilingual 

Description: 
-------------------- 
Automap helps you find the shortest route or fastest. The program takes into account the negative aspects of laps, investment, one-way traffic in major cities. The shorter the distance, faster Diderot. Automap calculates the length of the route and travel time. 
Automatic redirection (Automatic re-routing) 
If you have deviated from the route, the software provides an alternative route. You never get lost. In the case of roadblocks or traffic jams AutoMap consider a detour. 
Voice messages (Voice Mail) 
Do you think looking at a map while driving - not safe? We - yes! Therefore, Automap supports voice messages. The program will provide advance notice of the road next maneuver. You can select the voice and language. 
Scale free passage of the selection (the free choice of scale) 
Despite its small size, handheld screen is enough to see a map of the city or even country. Zoom slider accelerates the change of scale, providing quick access to detailed and general appearance. The catch, you can also use up and down. 
Choice of color schemes for day and night (choice of color schemes for day and night use) 
Combination of colors - not just a matter of taste! Special scheme for driving at night reduces the brightness of the screen so that was not blinded. During the day, you can choose from several color schemes according to their preferences and lighting conditions.
